item.title: SmileDirectClub has launched its third SmileShop in Singapore
item.description: SmileDirectClub, a US-based teledentistry company, has partnered with Nuffield Dental Holdings to open a new SmileShop location in Singapore. Located in Nuffield Dental Jewel at Wheelock Place, the new SmileShop offers a convenient and affordable way for Singaporeans to achieve the smile they’ve always wanted. This latest SmileShop will utilize the same digital treatment process and retail concept as SmileDirectClub’s existing locations at HarbourFront Centre and One Raffles Place. As a telehealth pioneer specializing in direct-to-consumer teeth straightening, SmileDirectClub is known for its clear aligner treatment, which has benefited over a million customers worldwide.
